name: Flap Flap 3D (Webplayer)
description:
Flap Flap 3D is a flappy bird like game in 3D with some funny sound effects :)

This game was made for Fuck This Jam.

Fly between or even through pipes! Watch water pour through pipes. There is even a secret to uncover - some pipes are special!

How to play? Just use Space to fly.

Downloadable versions are available at http://jernej.itch.io/3d-flap-flap
